about_the_game:
This nightclub glamorous outfit DLC provides players with more fashion options to create a feminine lifestyle.
Through this DLC, players will get a series of high-quality fashion women's clothing, leopard print evening dresses are suitable for banquets or formal events, black tube top dresses are suitable for romantic dates or dinner parties, and tight hip skirts are suitable for Wear it at a party or prom. No matter which one it is, it can make the player's character more refined and full of fashion sense.
In short, the DLC package of "3D LOVER - CLUB" will bring players a more comprehensive choice of fashionable women's clothing, and at the same time bring more diversified content to the game. Whether it is to show off your own fashion collocation in the game, or to try different dressing styles for social occasions, this DLC will bring players a better gaming experience. Let's create a lifestyle full of femininity together!

name: 3D LOVER - CLUB

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft Windows 7\8\10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Celeron 1.5(1.5G) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: This nightclub glamorous outfit DLC provides players with more fashion options to create a feminine lifestyle.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Portugal, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Russian
